channel.title: Speakers on TunedIn | Community Meetups
channel.description: Recent content in Speakers on TunedIn | Community Meetups
channel.copyright: Copyright © 2024 | Built with Hugo and GitHub Pages

item.title: Neil Johnson
item.description: Neil Johnson’s career in enterprise IT began in 1996, starting with Netware (CNE) and then Windows NT (MCSE) and Solaris.

item.title: David Brook
item.description: David, a distinguished Microsoft MVP in the Security category, brings a wealth of expertise in Microsoft Intune and Device Management capabilities.

item.title: Steve Beaumont
item.description: Meet Steve Beaumont, the tech wizard who makes even the most complicated technology seem simple.

item.title: Paul Winstanley
item.description: Paul Winstanley is a seven-times Microsoft Intune MVP who has 30 years of IT experience.

item.title: Niall Brady
item.description: Niall Brady is a blogger and an occasional speaker who focuses on step-by-step guides and videos for Windows 365, Intune, ConfigMgr, and more.

item.title: Dan Gough
item.description: Dan is a veteran application packager and former Microsoft MVP, battle-hardened from the trenches of deploying applications for a diverse range of clients.

item.title: Gerry Hampson
item.description: Gerry is a Senior Consultant for Ergo Group based in Dublin, Ireland and is a specialist in Microsoft consultancy and implementations, particularly in the area of enterprise client management.
